description: This Java source file defines a REST controller for managing beacon-based offers/promotions in an airport passenger service platform. It includes endpoints for listing, retrieving, creating, and deleting beacon offers, utilizing Spring Boot annotations and conventions.

classes.name: BeaconOfferController
classes.description: Spring REST controller for CRUD operations on beacon offers, handling HTTP requests related to beacon-based promotional offers.

methods.name: list
methods.description: Handles GET requests to list all beacon offers, optionally filtered by beaconId and active status.

methods.name: get
methods.description: Handles GET requests to retrieve a specific beacon offer by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if not found.

methods.name: create
methods.description: Handles POST requests to create a new beacon offer, generating a UUID and setting timestamps.

methods.name: delete
methods.description: Handles DELETE requests to remove a beacon offer by its UUID, throwing NotFoundException if not exists.
